Nightstrike::

"You're lying...!! wel. half-lying"roared Nighstrike'spark "I'm not 
have friends and I don't friends of those... those idiots... 
Decepticons rarely say the true 'cause the haven't honor code as the 
weak maximals... When I woke up I was in Swichblade's lab and I guess 
that I'm a rebuilted Decepticon as my brother Firestrike... and don't 
call me CONDOR!!!"

While was telling that Nightstrike did efforts to wake up.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade's voice came back, but more insistant.
> 
> AzureBlade: Do you feel it? Do you remember these faces? This is 
> Epyon, you commander, and Alpha, you friend! Do you feel them 
Condor? 
> Do you see that the real lies are those the Decepticons gave you? 
Can 
> you tell me how they brought you to their side? Open you eyes, 
Condor, 
> open your eyes if only to see the Matrix! See the reality as it is!
>

same

anguised

> > loyalty to Swichblade and after him to Megatron..."
> >

inside
